sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div(class="container")
	AddUser(v-on:add-tool="addTool")
	p(v-if="tools.length <= 0") Nenhuma ferramenta cadastrada...
	
	div(class="list-group")
		div(class="list-group-item" v-for="(tool, index) in allTolls" :key="index")
			v-row(no-gutters, align="center")
				
				v-col(cols="1", sm="1", md="1", align-self="center")
					v-avatar(color="primary", dark)
						v-icon(x-large) mdi-account-circle

				v-col(cols="10", sm="10", md="10", align-self="center")
					span Nome: 
						strong  {{ tool.name }}
					br
					span Tipo: 
						strong  {{ tool.type }}
					br
					span Preço: 
						strong  {{ tool.price }}

				v-col(cols="1", sm="1", md="1", align-self="center")
					div
						v-btn(class="ma-2", color="primary", dark, small, v-on:click="removeUser")
							v-icon(x-large) mdi-delete
				br
</template>

<script>
import AddUser from './AddUser.vue'
//import AddTool from './AddTool.vue'

export default {
	components: {
		AddUser
	},

	data () {
		return {
			tools : []
		}
	},

	methods: {
		addTool(tool) {
			this.tools.push(tool)
		},

		removeUser(index) {
			this.tools.splice(index, 1)
		}
	},

	computed: {
	allTools() {
		return this.tools.map(tool => ({
			...tool,
			type:  !tool.type.trim() ? 'Não informado.' : tool.type,
		}))
	}
	}
}
</script>

<style>
</style>
